input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP Team Jayco Alula 2025 Pro Air Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Delta Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Midweight Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Light Jacket'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Core Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Thermal Jacket'
  - Name='Nomadic Tech Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Core Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Team Jayco Alula 2025 Pro Air Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are high-performance cycling jerseys designed for optimal comfort and breathability, likely similar in function and features, though brand and specific materials may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Delta Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and cycling jersey category; likely similar focus on fit and performance, but the 'Pro Delta' model may differ in fabric or intended conditions from the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and type of cycling jersey; likely close in purpose and construction but potentially different from the Core Jersey in terms of fabric weight or features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Midweight Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey from same brand but midweight thermal suggests a warmer, heavier garment unlike the lightweight Core Jersey.
A short sleeve T-shirt is very different from a specialized cycling jersey in terms of construction, fit, features, and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Light Jacket
scores_with_rationales.rationale: From the same Core line and brand, but as a light jacket rather than a jersey, different construction and use case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and cycling jersey with a likely focus on vapor/wicking technology; similar category but possibly different feature set or fabric from Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Core Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Core line and brand, cycling jersey with likely similar materials and features, but long sleeve instead of short sleeve; very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Thermal Jacket
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Core line and brand but thermal jacket indicates heavier, warmer layer differing from lightweight short sleeve jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nomadic Tech Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar category as cycling jersey and likely similar intended use, but from a different brand and possibly different construction or materials.
Same brand, Core line, and product type (cycling jersey); likely identical features and construction aside from fit for women.
